snippet.title: Flight Of Nova - Trailer
snippet.description:
STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1069190/Flight_Of_Nova/
Updates:  https://flight-of-nova.com

Flight of Nova is a space and atmospheric flight simulator in which you control spacecraft on and around a full-scale planet. You will fly an assortment of craft doing transport and research missions in an environment with realistic aerodynamics and orbital physics. 

Features:
-realistic gravitation physics
-atmospheric density based on earth data
-aerodynamic drag corresponding to vessel shape
-drag / air friction energy calculations on hull
-real-time accurate orbital data 
-g-force load calculation
-orbital stations and docking system
-planet surface outposts
-full-scale body diameter 12’700 km
-search and transport missions
-quick flight challenges

Soundtrack by: Dream State Logic
http://www.dreamstatelogic.com/
